headline: PG&E Partners With Habitat For Humanity, Donates For California Housing Projects
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is among the 13 Best Electrical Infrastructure Stocks to Invest In. Pacific Gas and Electric Company, a subsidiary of PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG), has announced a $500,000 charitable engagement with Habitat for Humanity California as part of a two-year effort called Connecting Hometowns. The funds will go toward 10 affordable housing and restoration […]
